ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The Christian Fellowship is working for Health & Nutrition, Education & Livelihood of women, Children, aged, differently able and needy people of the target area. Major achievements are as under: 1. Runs a 100 bed multi specialty hospital. 2. 30 bed hospital for Eye care services. 3. Runs School from Nursery to Higher Secondary in the rural area. 4. Financial support for self employment to 30 persons with disabilities. 5. Vocational training conducted for 40 persons with disability. 6. Inclusion of 60 persons with disabilities by organic farming and livelihood opportunities. 7. Inclusion of 100 persons with disabilities as members of farmers club. 8. Inclusion of 90 persons with disabilities as members of inclusive SHGs. 9. Nearly 6500 cataract surgeries performed annually. 10. Nutrition specific Interventions in consultation with state government and UNICEF in the whole of Chhattisgarh state. 11. Promotion of Water and Sanitation under Swachh Bharat Mission focusing on disability inclusive Water, Sanitation and hygiene.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: INTRODUCTION:- Women empowerment has become the greatest issue. How this empowerments come from? No doubt, only and only women can change the scenario. â€œThose who help them selves are helped by othersâ€ is very true every one and the BASTRIA WOMEN are known for their hard labour. For the first time Rural and Urban women combine to work for their progress and to solve their problems. Thus, â€œTRIWEâ€, A Women society dedicated to the development of Bastar come into existence. Women, especially tribal women with their distinguished culture and potentialities can prove their efficiency if shaped. This is the basic reason to from a society where the combination of Urban & Rural representation is set up, and they together will work for their development with these objectives, to work for a social cause which would benefit themselves as well as for the family and the society with the approaches suitable on practical ground on sustainable basis which would incur the all round development and would prove a step ahead towards prosperity. 1. To strengthen local human resources. 2. To generate employment from local resources on sustainable basis. 3. To link them with various scheme of govt. department, financial institutions and other agencies. 4. To make them aware of their responsibilities and capabilities. 5. To work at micro level with effective planning . 6. To provide a platform for the local people for their socio and economic development in collaboration with the various govt. authorities and like minded institutions. 7. To train maximum unemployed youths, rural women for self employment schemes. 8. To work for their skill development and value addition of their product. 9. To start full fledged training canter to give maximum benefits to the local people, helping them to start their own production units. 10. To provide technical support & skill up gradation, encouraging usage of improved tools. 11. To provide marketing platform for the products of Rural Artisans through fairs craft bazaar and exhibitions. 12. To establish Rehabilitation Centre for released prisoners. 13. To establish common facility centre and training for setup of various industrial units in Jail campus in support of Jail Administration and K.V.I.C.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The genesis of UPWAN was to help those who are the most vulnerable (Rural poor, , women, etc.) and are in urgent need of help. So we organized ourselves in the movement towards the above cause and consequently articulated the aims and objectives we had in our mind. From very beginning, we, at UPWAN , believe that development has to be holistic, to bring real fruits to the most needy. In this connection, we worked in the area of - 1. Livelihood, 2. Skill Development 3. Capacity building 4. Women Empowerment, 5. Community Development and Social Welfare These areas continues to be prime areas of our work. We have brought a substantial change on the ground by focusing our energies in these sectors as well as building our understanding about related issues. UPWANâ€™s drive towards expanding employability of the youth of the area is bearing fruit now . Women Empowerment â€“ o Projects by UPWAN had been conducted to teach basic employment skills to women in rural villages. Training for their capacity building was included in the projects , women were trained in techniques of fund raising and leadership skills. o Capacity Building of Women SHGs through Entrepreneurship Program was also done by us Livelihood - Livelihood opportunities have been provided by UPWAN through programs on - Bamboo handicraft , Honey Bee keeping , Kashthkala Prashikshan , Trainings on Motor winding, Rajmistry Plumber, Computer and other approx. 3000 individuals are benefited Capacity Building â€“ Capacity building of SHGs in rural area of Chhattisgarh has been done through Sustainable Economic Upliftment Activities, Organizational development and Behavioral change . Skill development Initiatives by UPWAN Need base skill development through Vocational trainings in the field of Agriculture , ....have been conducted through UPWAN in all over Chhattisgarh
